## PageSetup.Orientation property

Returns or sets the orientation of the page.

```csharp
public Orientation Orientation { get; set; }
```

### Remarks

Changing **Orientation** swaps [`PageWidth`](../pagewidth) and [`PageHeight`](../pageheight).
